channel.title: Cracking games
channel.description:
My friend bought battlefield 2... i burned it and got a keygen and shit ....
What i need is
Instructions on how to get no cd patch WORKING. And yes i did google it ;). As it does not recognise the burnt cd as a game disk.
I dont really give a SHIT about getting online i just want to play offline. But of course if i get online that is an added bonus ;)
any help would be much appreciated

item.title: Cracking games
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

how could i check

Read full topic

item.title: Cracking games
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

nVidea Geforce 4 440MX here…fuck that

but heres what you got to do:

  • Download Daemon Tools -> http://85.17.36.30/daemon403-x86.exe
    -install it and reboot when asked.
  • Get the image -> http://dl.gamecopyworld.com/?d=2005&f=jmt-miniBF2CD!rar (pick a mirror that is online)
  • Fire up Daemon tools, load the image and try to play.
    If that didnt work google for anti-blaxx and install it.

Read full topic

item.title: Cracking games
item.dc:creator: @ryefox2 ryefox2
item.description:
@ryefox2 wrote:

You need to install it first to get a no-cd patch working though don’t you?

Read full topic

item.title: Cracking games
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

[quote=“BobDole81, post:4, topic:9256”]That depends on what you want to do…if you just want a no-cd crack, you don’t need to worry about that.

http://m1008.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_battlefield_2.shtml
Grab the fixed EXE for the version of the game you have and just use the exe given to replace the game exe. If it doesn’t work, then you can use the fixed image, for which you’ll need something like Daemon Tools to mount the iso - it acts like an original cd to allow you to play the game without having to use a no-cd patch.[/quote]
u have had somewhat experience with no-cd patching so i know what it does… From google it looks like alot of people had to do the crap with the fixed image and the mount of the .iso

im going to try yours and if it dont work im guna hunt you down and ask how to do that rap with the mounting and the fixed image

Read full topic

item.title: Cracking games
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

That depends on what you want to do…if you just want a no-cd crack, you don’t need to worry about that.

http://m1008.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_battlefield_2.shtml
Grab the fixed EXE for the version of the game you have and just use the exe given to replace the game exe. If it doesn’t work, then you can use the fixed image, for which you’ll need something like Daemon Tools to mount the iso - it acts like an original cd to allow you to play the game without having to use a no-cd patch.

Read full topic

item.title: Cracking games
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

bobdole…

i googled it and everyone has had to do some technical stuff about mounting and .iso to work it

Read full topic

item.title: Cracking games
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

www.gamecopyworld.com

Find the no-cd patch there and replace the BF2 exe with it - you don’t need the cd to run it with a no-cd patch.

Read full topic
